titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for full benefits for disabled widows and widowers without regard to age.
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for full benefits for disabled widows and widowers without regard to age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary: This bill provides for full Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance (OASDI) benefits, without regard to age, for disabled individuals who are widowed. In addition, the bill exempts disabled individuals who are widowed from certain reductions in OASDI benefits and otherwise revises provisions related to such reductions.
